definition: to let sb down/to be unfair/I'm sorry/pardon me (formal)
right/correct/couple/pair/towards/at/for/to face/opposite/to treat (sb a certain way)/to match together/to adjust/to fit/to suit/to answer/to reply/classifier: couple
(negative prefix)/not/no
to live/to dwell/to stay/to reside/to stop/(suffix indicating firmness, steadiness, or coming to a halt)

sentences.english: Your costume can't even do justice to your slender figure.
sentences.chinese: 穿成这样也太对不住你的好身材了。

sentences.english: I hope you will be magnanimous enough to excuse any incorrect behaviour on my part.
sentences.chinese: 对不住的地方，望您海量包涵。

sentences.english: Your costume can't even do justice to your figure.
sentences.chinese: 穿成这样也太对不住你的好身材了。

sentences.english: His nose was bleeding and, at that moment, I felt sorry for him.
sentences.chinese: 他的鼻子在淌血，就在那一刻，我感到有点对不住他。

sentences.english: Yeah, sorry, guys, but I'm busy from now until mid-October.
sentences.chinese: 对不住各位了，从现在到十月中旬我都没空了。

sentences.english: I was angry, but I felt sorry for him, too.
sentences.chinese: 我很生气，但我也觉得对不住他。

sentences.english: I said it's too late to apologize , it's too late .
sentences.chinese: 我说，对不住已经是太迟，太迟。

sentences.english: Just don't waste any more energy feeling guilty about Janice.
sentences.chinese: 不过别再白花精力觉得自己对不住贾妮丝了。

definition: unworthy/to let down/I'm sorry/excuse me/pardon me/if you please/sorry? (please repeat)
to feel very apologetic
to blame sb wrongly
ashamed
to be sorry/to feel apologetic/sorry!
please forgive me
to be ashamed to face (sb)/to feel bad about having failed (sb)
to feel embarrassed/to find it embarrassing/to be sorry (for inconveniencing sb)
to mock/to be ridiculed/to incur ridicule through one's poor performance (humble)
to bother/to press sb, usu. to do sth/it's a tough job/sorry to bother you (polite, used to thank sb for a favor)
to mind/to take offense
to speak seriously/to exaggerate
to offer an apology/to make amends
alas/oh dear
interjection or grunt of agreement or recognition (e.g. yes, it's me!)/to sigh
to calm down/to quell one's anger
please forgive me
